meanings.definition: A covering for the foot and ankle, typically extending to the calf.
meanings.sent1: I wear cozy socks to keep my feet warm in winter.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of colorful socks to match her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The socks danced off the clothesline in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: His words wrapped around her heart like a comforting pair of socks.
meanings.sent5: The bright red socks stood out in the sea of black shoes.

meanings.sent1: He socks the ball with all his might during the game.
meanings.sent2: The boxer socks his opponent with a powerful punch.
meanings.sent3: She playfully socks him on the arm to get his attention.
meanings.sent4: The storm socks the coast with strong winds and heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected news socks him like a sudden blow to the stomach.
